articles.title: If Chris Sale really believes he hasn't earned his money, there's a way to prove it - NBC Sports Boston
articles.description: Chris Sale laments not earning his money since signing a five-year, $145 million extension before the 2019 season. If the Red Sox left-hander really feels he's undeserving of the contract, our John Tomase has a way for him to prove it.
articles.content:
With each new injury, Chris Sale sounds a familiar refrain: He hates not earning his money.
And it's a lot of money, too. Since signing a five-year, $145 million extension that kicked in just in tim… [+3292 chars]

articles.description: The Dodgers were all in on Juan Soto, but only up to a certain point. Here is what the Nationals wanted from LA in return for him.
